T02D3675:294b-0: @294b nyi ma dang zla ba dang rab tu snang

T02D3675:294b-37: dang mi rnams kyi rol mo'i bye brag mngon par

T02D3675:295a-7: ba dang mtho zhing mdzes pa'i khri la sogs pa

T02D3675:295a-28: dang mi rnams kyi phun sum tshogs pa'i rkyen du

T02D3675:295a-32: dpag bsam gyi shing chen po dang /

T02D3675:295a-38: rkang dbyug la sogs pa grub pa'i rdzas dang /
T02D3675:295a-39: skyes bu chen po'i sngon du 'gro ba'i rtsibs stong dang ldan pa'i 'khor lo dang /

T02D3675:295a-42: mdzod khengs pa'i blon po dang /

T02D3675:295a-46: gdugs bzangs gser yu can dang /
T02D3675:295a-53: rab tu 'bar ba'i 'khor lo la sogs pa skyes

T02D3675:295a-56: pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' ma lus

T02D3675:295b-0: lha dang mi rnams kyi khyad par @295b 'phags pa'i
T02D3675:295b-1: bye brag la mchod pa'i rdzas rim par bshams pa'am
T02D3675:295b-3: bdag pos yongs su bzung ba'i khyad par dang blos
T02D3675:295b-4: sprul pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mchod pa dang kun
T02D3675:295b-5: du bzang po'i mchod sprin gyi rgya mtsho bsam mi
T02D3675:295b-6: khyab pa dus dang dus min du byung ba dang
T02D3675:295b-7: / mdor na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'

T02D3675:295b-12: tshogs gnyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i mthu dang rig pa'i
T02D3675:295b-13: rgyal po'i 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod pa'i stobs
T02D3675:295b-14: kyis de bzhin du gyur cig / na ma:sarba buddha
T02D3675:295b-15: bo dhi satv'a n'am sarba ta th'a ga te spha
T02D3675:295b-16: ra ni hi mam ga ga na khams manta te
T02D3675:295b-17: sv'a h'a / 'dis mchod pa'i sprin chen po gtibs par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D3675:295b-18: de ltar sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams
T02D3675:295b-19: kyi mtshan yid la byas nas mchod pa phul bas

T02D3675:295b-22: cig / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phrin las ma

T02D3675:295b-25: pa rlabs so che thams cad mthar phyin par gyur
T02D3675:295b-26: cig / ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo du

T02D3675:296a-5: la mchod pa byas pas sems can thams cad la

T02D3675:296a-7: ldan par gyur cig / bro nad thams cad rab

T02D3675:296b-1: rims kyis mi tshugs pa dang /
T02D3675:296b-2: mtshon gyis mi tshugs pa dang /

T02D3675:297a-1: pa dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi

T02D3675:297a-35: gsum gyi nyes pa ma lus pa dag par gyur
T02D3675:297a-36: cig / nyon mangs pa'i sgrib pa dang /
T02D3675:297a-37: bag chags kyi sgrib pa dang /
T02D3675:297a-39: snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgrib pa la sogs pa sgrib
T02D3675:297a-40: pa'i tshogs ma lus pa rnams par dag pa dang
T02D3675:297a-41: byang bar gyur cig / mtha' yas pa'i 'gro ba

T02D3675:297a-43: thams cad dag nas bla na med pa'i byang chub
T02D3675:297b-0: kyi sa la phyin par @297b gyur cig /'khor ba'i
T02D3675:297b-1: mtha' ji srid yod pa de srid du pha dang
T02D3675:297b-2: ma la sogs pa dag pa dang ma dag pa'i
T02D3675:297b-3: sems can thams cad la rang dang gzhan gyi smon

T02D3675:300b-35: rig sngags 'di lan brgyad bzlas pas de bzhin gshegs

T02D3675:300b-38: na ma:sarba buddha po dhi la satv'a n'am sarba tra
T02D3675:300b-39: ku su mi t'a bhi dzny'a ra shi ni na
T02D3675:300b-41: de ltar sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams
T02D3675:300b-42: cad la bstod cing gus pas dbang du gsol nas
T02D3675:300b-43: dpung gnyen thob par bya ba'i phyir skyabs gsum skyob
T02D3675:300b-44: pa dang bcas pa la rab tu gus pas skyabs
T02D3675:300b-45: su mchi'o // de yang rnam par dag pa'i ye
T02D3675:300b-46: shes zung du 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin sku gsum
T02D3675:300b-47: lhun gyis grub pa'i phyag rgya mtshon pa'i lha tshogs
T02D3675:300b-48: grags pa 'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po sangs rgyas
T02D3675:300b-49: thams cad la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su mchi'o //
T02D3675:300b-50: smra bsam brjod du med pa gsung gi rang bzhin
T02D3675:300b-51: dus gsum gyi rgyal ba thams cad skyed par byed
T02D3675:301a-1: mtshan nyid so so'i ye shes ma lus par ston
T02D3675:301a-2: pa dam chos mdo sde rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing
T02D3675:301a-3: skyabs su mchi'o // 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor mig zum
T02D3675:301a-4: nas stong pa'i 'gro ba'i skyabs med pa rnams kyi
T02D3675:301a-5: skyabs dang dpung gnyen mdzad cing phrin las bzhi yis
T02D3675:301a-6: thugs rtse gcig par don mdzad pa'i gtso bo theg
T02D3675:301a-7: pa chen po'i dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs
T02D3675:301a-8: su mchi'o zhes lan gsum du'o //
T02D3675:301a-9: de ltar skyabs gsum bla ma dang bcas pa la
T02D3675:301a-10: dpang por gzhag / rten du gzung skyabs su gsol
T02D3675:301a-11: nas stongs dang grogs zhus pa /
T02D3675:301a-12: de bzhin du gzigs te che ge mo la sogs
T02D3675:301a-13: pa mtha' yas pa'i 'gro ba ma lus pa rnams
T02D3675:301a-14: srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i dba' rlabs drag pos rang dbang
T02D3675:301a-16: mgon med par bying ba rnams la deng nas bzung
T02D3675:301a-17: nas byang chub la thug gi bar du bla na
T02D3675:301a-18: med pa gsum la skyabs su mchi bas sems can
T02D3675:301a-19: gling med pa rnams kyi gling du gyur cig /
T02D3675:301a-20: gnas med pa rnams kyi gnas su gyur cig /
T02D3675:301a-21: skyabs med pa rnams kyi skyabs su gyur cig /
T02D3675:301a-22: skyob pa med pa rnams kyi skyob par gyur cig
T02D3675:301a-23: / mgon med pa rnams kyi mgon du gyur cig
T02D3675:301a-24: / dpung gnyen med pa rnams kyi dpung gnyen du
T02D3675:301a-25: gyur cig / ji srid sems can thams cad yongs
T02D3675:301a-26: su mya ngan las ma 'das kyi bar de srid
T02D3675:301a-27: du bdag kyang yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'
T02D3675:301a-28: zhing sems can thams cad la lam bde ba dang
T02D3675:301a-29: / 'jug pa rab tu bde ba'i sgo nas phan
T02D3675:301a-30: pa dang bde ba rgya chen po nam mkha'i mtha'
T02D3675:301a-31: klas pa tsam gyis gang zhing yongs su rgyas par
T02D3675:301a-32: gyur cig / skyabs su 'gro ba'i dge ba'i rtsa
T02D3675:301a-33: ba 'di la brten nas sems can thams cad bla
T02D3675:301a-34: na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
T02D3675:301a-35: kyi go 'phang la dgod par gyur cig / gzhan
T02D3675:301a-36: yang sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang
T02D3675:301a-37: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang la
T02D3675:301a-38: ma bkod kyi bar du yang lha dang mi'i rten
T02D3675:301a-39: phun sum tshogs pa la brten nas /
T02D3675:301a-40: rang rang gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen de nyid kun du spyod pa sna tshogs pa'i sgo nas /
T02D3675:301a-41: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ngo mtshar bas yang
T02D3675:301a-42: dag par mnyes par byed par gyur cig / byang
T02D3675:301b-0: @301b chub tu sems bskyed pa dang yang mi 'bral
T02D3675:301b-1: bar gyur cig / theg pa chen po'i chos mtha'
T02D3675:301b-2: dag la dga' bde kha na ma tho ba med
T02D3675:301b-3: pas longs spyod par gyur cig / bsod nams dang
T02D3675:301b-4: ye shes kyi tshogs kyi bdag nyid pha rol tu
T02D3675:301b-5: phyin pa drug gi sgrub pa la yang dag par
T02D3675:301b-6: gnas par gyur cig / de ltar gus shing skyabs
T02D3675:301b-7: su mchi bas bdag nyid bslab gsum gyis lus yongs
T02D3675:301b-9: gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa sangs rgyas
T02D3675:301b-10: kyi chos grangs med pa rnams la longs spyod cing
T02D3675:301b-11: spyan dang / mngon par shes pa la sogs pa
T02D3675:301b-12: yon tan thams cad la dbang thob cing rang rgyud
T02D3675:301b-13: phyug cing rgyas par gyur cig / bdud kyi gnod
T02D3675:301b-14: spyan dang / pa dang / bar du gcod pa
T02D3675:301b-15: thams cad kyis mi brdzi bar gyur cig / dge
T02D3675:301b-16: ba'i rtsa ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mthus yongs
T02D3675:301b-17: su rdzogs shing smin nas byang chub tu lung bstan
T02D3675:301b-18: pa thob cing thabs mkhas pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing
T02D3675:301b-19: spyan dang / pa dang / sbyong ba dang /
T02D3675:301b-20: sems can yongs su smin par byed par gyur cig
T02D3675:301b-21: / mthar mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa
T02D3675:301b-22: thob nas sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho
T02D3675:301b-23: las yongs su sgrol bar gyur cig / dkon mchog
T02D3675:301b-24: gsum gyi bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin
T02D3675:301b-25: du gyur cig / deng de bzhin gshegs pa sras
T02D3675:301b-26: dang bcas pa rnams kyi mtshan nas brjod phyag 'tshal
T02D3675:301b-28: che ge mo la sogs pa mtha' yas pa'i 'gro
T02D3675:301b-29: ba ma lus pa'i mun pa bsal nas lam mchog
T02D3675:301b-30: tu gyur pa bskyed pa'i phyir dang /
T02D3675:301b-31: glo bur gyi nyon mongs pas gdungs pa'i skye bo
T02D3675:301b-32: mtha' dag bsgral bar bya ba'i don du gsol ba
T02D3675:301b-33: ni / mgon po gang zhig gis gang zag pa
T02D3675:301b-34: med pa'i bdud rtsi'i mchog brnyes kyang sems can gyi
T02D3675:301b-35: las dang skal ba'i dbang gis thugs cung zad snyoms
T02D3675:301b-36: par zhugs pa rnams la dam pa'i chos kyi bdud
T02D3675:301b-37: rtsi dri ma med cing 'od gsal ba gsung bar
T02D3675:301b-38: gsol chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul lo zhes
T02D3675:301b-39: ni / lan gsum mo // gang yang 'jig rten
T02D3675:301b-40: gyi sgron ma dam pa de dag ring du mi
T02D3675:301b-41: gnas par zhi bar gshegs par bzhed pa de dag
T02D3675:301b-42: la yang ji srid sems can gyi khams yod pa
T02D3675:301b-43: de srid du nyi ma dang zla ba lta bu'i
T02D3675:302a-0: tshul gyis sems can gyi khams la @302a * //
T02D3675:302a-1: rab tu gsal bar bzhugs su gsol ba ste /
T02D3675:302a-2: bdud bzhi bcom pa'i sman pa'i mchog chen po khyod
T02D3675:302a-3: la gus pas rab tu bzhugs su gsol bar gsol
T02D3675:302a-5: 'jig rten ma rig pa la sogs pas rab tu
T02D3675:302a-6: ldongs pa rnams la dri ma med cing 'od gsal
T02D3675:302a-7: ba'i rang bzhin yongs su gsal bar gyur cig /
T02D3675:302a-8: rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa rnams la mchod cing
T02D3675:302a-9: gus pas chos kyi sgron me sbar ba zhus pa

T02D3675:302a-12: gzhan yang 'gro ba ma lus pa rnams kyis theg

T02D3675:302a-14: thob par gyur cig /'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang

T02D3675:302a-19: dge ba'i bshes gnyen dam pas bsam pa dang mthun
T02D3675:302a-20: pa'i chos ston par gyur cig / sems can thams

T02D3675:302a-27: / dang / dang ldan pa'am / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang ldan pa'am /
T02D3675:302a-28: shes rab kyi phung po dang ldan pa'am /
T02D3675:302a-29: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dang ldan pa'am /
T02D3675:302a-30: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang ldan pa de dag kyang
T02D3675:302a-31: nges par 'byung ba'i don du ston par gyur cig
T02D3675:302a-32: / gang yang dag par bsgrub pa la chos gang
T02D3675:302a-36: spang ba med par gzhan la 'chad par gyur cig
T02D3675:302a-37: / yang dag par sgrub pa la zhugs pa ni
T02D3675:302a-39: chos thams cad gnyis su med par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mthong nas /
T02D3675:302a-40: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sems can thams cad
T02D3675:302a-41: la nges par 'byung ba'i lam yang dag par ston
T02D3675:302a-42: par gyur cig / rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa

T02D3675:302b-0: pa bka'i 'bangs 'khor bcas thams @302b cad kyi bsam
T02D3675:302b-1: pa yongs su shes pas 'khor thams cad mgu bar
T02D3675:302b-2: byed pa dang / 'khor thams cad kyi lus sems tshim par byed pa dang /
T02D3675:302b-6: snying rje chen po bskyed pa dang /
T02D3675:302b-7: de kho na nyid mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa dang /
T02D3675:302b-8: gzhan ma yin pa nyid dang /
T02D3675:302b-13: rtsod pa med pa nyid du ston par gyur cig
T02D3675:302b-14: / rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa'i chos kyi gsung
T02D3675:302b-15: dri ma med pa de bzhin nyid dang mnyam zhing
T02D3675:302b-16: / chos kyi dbyings kyi ngos mnyam pa des 'jig
T02D3675:302b-17: rten gyi khams rab 'byams ma lus pa rnams la
T02D3675:302b-18: thogs pa med cing khyab par gyur cig / de
T02D3675:302b-19: bzhin gshegs pa tshad med grangs med bsam gyis mi
T02D3675:302b-20: khyab gzhal du med pa brjod du med pa'i chos
T02D3675:302b-21: / dang ldan zhing / snying rje chen pos zin
T02D3675:302b-22: pa'i sems can rnams la nges par 'byung ba'i lam
T02D3675:302b-23: yang dag par ston par gyur cig / nam mkha'i
T02D3675:302b-24: khams mtha' yas mu med pa bzhin du rgyal ba
T02D3675:302b-25: sras dang bcas pa'i mkhyen pa dang /
T02D3675:302b-26: brtse ba mu med pas che ge mo la sogs
T02D3675:302b-27: pa 'gro ba mtha' yas mu med pa la brtse
T02D3675:302b-28: bas bu lta bur dgongs nas 'gro ba ma lus
T02D3675:302b-29: pa rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab dri
T02D3675:302b-32: rab tu rtogs pa dri ma med pa the tshom mi za ba dang /
T02D3675:302b-33: rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas /
T02D3675:302b-34: nam mkha' lta bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i don la ngo mtshar ba dang /
T02D3675:302b-35: rmad du byung ba'i 'du shes skye bar gyur cig
T02D3675:302b-36: / rgyal ba sras dang bcas pas che ge mo
T02D3675:302b-37: la sogs pa'i sems can thams cad snying rjes mi
T02D3675:302b-38: gtong zhing thams cad kyang ngo mtshar ba'i 'jug pa
T02D3675:302b-39: la gnas par gyur cig / dkon mchog gsum gyi
T02D3675:302b-40: bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin du grub
T02D3675:302b-41: par gyur cig / deng phyogs bcu dus gsum du
T02D3675:302b-42: bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa sras dang bcas pa

T02D3675:302b-45: bla na med pa'i byang chub la mchis kyi bar

T02D3675:303a-0: @303a * // 'gro ba ma lus pa gdon par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D3675:303a-3: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslabs pa dang /
T02D3675:303a-5: slob par 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sgrib
T02D3675:303a-6: pa med par rang bzhin thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
T02D3675:303a-7: ye shes kyi chos nyid rjes su gzigs nas byang
T02D3675:303a-8: chub tu thugs bskyed pa ltar /
T02D3675:303a-9: che ge mo la sogs pa yang dag par rdzogs
T02D3675:303a-10: pa'i byang chub chen por sems bskyed par bgyis te
T02D3675:303a-11: / 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las sems can ma bsgral ba rnams bsgral ba dang /
T02D3675:303a-12: ma grol ba rnams grol bar bya ba dang /
T02D3675:303a-13: dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs dbyung bar bya ba dang /
T02D3675:303a-14: yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams chos
T02D3675:303a-15: kyi dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar
T02D3675:303a-16: bgyi'o // sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang /
T02D3675:303a-17: dge ba chos sdud kyi tshul khrims dang /
T02D3675:303a-18: sems can don byed kyi tshul khrims la yang dag par bslab par bgyi'o zhes lan gsum du'o //
T02D3675:303a-19: de ltar rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa thams cad
T02D3675:303a-20: kyi spyan sngar sems bskyed pa ma lus pa'i 'gro
T02D3675:303a-21: ba rnams bla na med pa'i byang chub la 'god
T02D3675:303a-22: par gyur cig / nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho las
T02D3675:303a-23: sems can ma sgrol ba rnams bdag gis yongs su
T02D3675:303a-24: sgrol bar gyur cig / sems can thams cad las
T02D3675:303a-25: kyi lu gu rgyud las ma sgrol ba rnams bdag
T02D3675:303a-26: gis sgrol bar byed par gyur cig /'khor ba'i rgya
T02D3675:303a-27: mtsho dpa' klod rab tu 'khrugs pa las sems can
T02D3675:303a-28: thams cad dbugs dbyung ba'i go skabs med pa la
T02D3675:303a-29: bdag gis yongs su dbugs 'byin par gyur cig /
T02D3675:303a-30: sems can thams cad sdug bsngal rgyu dang bcas pa

T02D3675:303a-32: bdag gis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gyur

T02D3675:303a-34: med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob
T02D3675:303a-35: par gyur cig / byang chub ma thob kyi bar
T02D3675:303a-36: du yang lha dang mi'i rten phun sum tshogs pa
T02D3675:303a-37: thob par gyur cig / byang chub tu sems bskyed
T02D3675:303a-38: pa dang mi 'bral bar gyur cig / bsod nams
T02D3675:303a-39: dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po yongs su 'phel

T02D3675:303b-6: bskyed nyi shu rtsa gnyis lam rnam pa lnga'i bdag
T02D3675:303b-7: nyid rim gyis bgrod par gyur cig / de la

T02D3675:303b-10: bsam pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gser lta bu dang /

T02D3675:304b-7: dang bral bar gyur cig / nyon mongs pa dang

T02D3675:304b-10: shes bya'i sgrib pa dang bral bar gyur cig /
T02D3675:304b-11: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang thob

T02D3675:304b-22: gnod pa la sogs pa thams cad mi 'byung zhing rgyun chad par gyur cig / dpal dang /
T02D3675:304b-28: bde legs la sogs pa yon tan phun sum tshogs
T02D3675:304b-29: pa thams cad 'phel zhing rgyas par gyur cig /
T02D3675:304b-30: nam 'chi ba'i dus su rang gis legs par spyad

T02D3675:304b-35: rang gi yi dam gyi lha rje btsun ma sgrol
T02D3675:304b-36: ma mngon sum du mthong bar gyur cig / mthong
T02D3675:304b-37: nas kyang de'i gdams pa dri ma med pa bdud
T02D3675:304b-38: rtsi'i mchog la spyod pa dang /
T02D3675:304b-39: lus sems tshim par gyur cig / shi ma thag
T02D3675:304b-40: tu skye ba gzhan gyis bar ma chod pa g-yu
T02D3675:304b-41: lo brgyan pa'i zhing khams su padma'i sdong po la
T02D3675:304b-42: rdzus te skyes nas sems can gyi khams dpag tu

T02D3675:304b-47: du 'bras la sogs pa'i kha zas sna tshogs pa

T02D3675:305a-0: @305a * // pa la cha gnyis par byas /
T02D3675:305a-1: sku gsung thugs kyi snying po lan bdun bsngags nas /
T02D3675:305a-2: byin gyis brlabs pa la padma kha phye ba'i phyag rgya byas la /
T02D3675:305a-3: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs ma lus
T02D3675:305a-4: pa la dbul ba'i sngags 'di lan bdun bzlas te
T02D3675:305a-6: dri ro phun sum tshogs pa la dmigs la dbul bar bya'o //
T02D3675:305a-7: aom na mo buddha bo dhi sa tv'a n'am aa
T02D3675:305a-8: pra ti ha ta sh'a sa n'am he he bha
T02D3675:305a-9: ga ba ti ma h'a sa buddha aa ba lo
T02D3675:305a-10: ki te ai dam ba lim grihna grihna /
T02D3675:305a-11: aa mri ta kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi tishtha h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02D3675:305a-12: de nas 'byung po thams cad la dbul ba ni /
T02D3675:305a-13: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am a'adya nuta panna tv'at aom a'a:h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3675:305a-14: aom aa mri ta kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi /
T02D3675:305a-19: bi spho ta ya bi spho ta ya sarba bighn'an
T02D3675:305a-20: bi na ya ka ma h'a ga na pa ti
T02D3675:305a-21: / dzi bi t'anta ka r'a ya h'um h'um h'um phat phat phat sv'a h'a //
T02D3675:305a-22: dang po ni de bzhin gshegs pa sras dang bcas pa rnams la dbul bar bya /
T02D3675:305a-23: gnyis pa ni phyogs skyong ba la sogs pa rnams la phul la phrin las su gsol ba ni /
T02D3675:305a-24: deng rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa rnams la sku
T02D3675:305a-25: gsung thugs kyi 'khrul pa mi mnga' ba ltar che
T02D3675:305a-26: ge mo la sogs pa mnga' ris kyi 'bangs su
T02D3675:305a-27: mchis pa rnams la lus ngag yid gsum gyi 'khrul
T02D3675:305a-28: pa spang ba'i phyir brtse bas gzigs par mdzod cig
T02D3675:305a-29: / rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa la rjes su
T02D3675:305a-30: chags pa dang khong khro ba med pa ltar che
T02D3675:305a-31: ge mo la sogs pa'i 'gro ba ma lus pa
T02D3675:305a-32: la ca co med pa'i chos ston par gyur cig
T02D3675:305a-33: / rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa la rmongs pa
T02D3675:305a-34: dang bsnyel ba med pas bsam gtan dang /
T02D3675:305a-36: ting nge 'dzin dang snyem par 'jug pa la thogs
T02D3675:305a-37: pa med pa ltar che ge mo la sogs pa'i
T02D3675:305a-38: 'gro ba ma lus pa la brjed ngas par mi
T02D3675:305a-40: rjes su gzung du gsol lo //
T02D3675:305a-41: rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa rnams la chags pa'am /
T02D3675:305a-44: chos gsungs pa la sogs pa gang la yang bsam gtan dang ldan pa ltar /
T02D3675:305a-45: che ge mo la sogs pa'i sems can thams cad
T02D3675:305a-46: la ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo du ma la 'jug
T02D3675:305a-47: pa'i byin gyi rlabs su gzigs par mdzod cig /
T02D3675:305b-0: @305b de bzhin gshegs pa sras dang bcas pa la
T02D3675:305b-1: tha dad med pa'i thugs chos kyi dbyings dbyer med
T02D3675:305b-2: cing mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis 'dod chags
T02D3675:305b-3: la sogs pa dang bral ba'i phyir /
T02D3675:305b-4: che ge mo la sogs pa'i 'gro ba rnams la khong khro ba med pa dang /
T02D3675:305b-5: log par nges pa'i sems med pa dang /
T02D3675:305b-6: tha dad pa'i 'du shes spangs pa'i phyir rjes su
T02D3675:305b-7: 'dul bar mdzod cig / sangs rgyas dang byang chub
T02D3675:305b-8: sems dpa' rnams la gti mug med pa'i phyir ye
T02D3675:305b-10: rnam par ltung ba med pa'i phyir /
T02D3675:305b-12: 'phags pa ma yin pas nges par mi 'byung ba'i phyir /
T02D3675:305b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang snyoms 'phags pa'i nges par 'byung ba dang /
T02D3675:305b-14: rang gi ngang gis grub pas gnyen po'i rjes su ma song ba dang /
T02D3675:305b-16: ma bsgoms pa med pa'i phyir /
T02D3675:305b-17: che ge mo la sogs pa 'gro ba ma lus pa rnams la mthon dman med pa dang /
T02D3675:305b-19: ngan pa med pa'i btang snyoms phun sum tshogs pa
T02D3675:305b-20: yang yongs su rdzogs par yang mdzod cig / rgyal
T02D3675:305b-21: ba sras dang bcas pa rnams dge ba'i chos la
T02D3675:305b-22: 'dun pa ste / de yang byams pa la 'dun pa dang /
T02D3675:305b-24: chos dang sems can la 'dun pa dang /
T02D3675:305b-25: byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par 'dzug pa la nyams pa med pa dang /
T02D3675:305b-26: brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa ltar che ge
T02D3675:305b-27: mo la sogs pa'i mtha' yas pa'i sems can 'gro
T02D3675:305b-28: ba ma lus pa rnams kyang dkon mchog gsum gyi
T02D3675:305b-30: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes sngon du 'gro ba'i
T02D3675:305b-31: rang bzhin gyis sems can thams cad bla na med
T02D3675:305b-32: pa'i ye shes thams cad mkhyen par yongs su rdzogs
T02D3675:305b-33: par bya ba'i phyir ye shes kyi spyan gyis gzigs
T02D3675:305b-34: su gsol lo // de bzhin gshegs pa sras dang
T02D3675:305b-35: bcas pa rnams ni sems can thams cad yal bar
T02D3675:305b-37: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du gzigs pas gang la yang nyams pa med pa dang /
T02D3675:305b-38: lus dang sems yang dag par sbyangs pa dang /
T02D3675:305b-40: de ltar mnga' ris kyi gdul bya rnams kyang brtson
T02D3675:305b-41: 'grus la yang dag par rab tu sbyor bas sems
T02D3675:306a-0: @306a * // can thams cad 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir /
T02D3675:306a-1: sna tshogs pas brtson 'grus nyams pa med par 'byung bar ci gnang /
T02D3675:306a-2: thub pa chen po rnams la mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas ma thag tu 'das pa dang /
T02D3675:306a-4: da ltar byung ba'i sems can gyi rgyud la rnam par bltas kyang phyis brjed pa dang /
T02D3675:306a-5: sems can gyi phung po la 'jug pa dang /
T02D3675:306a-6: phung po gsum du rnam par gzhag pa dang /
T02D3675:306a-7: sems can gyi bsam pa la 'jug pa dang /
T02D3675:306a-8: spyod pa la rnam par lta bas dran pa nyams pa med pa ltar /
T02D3675:306a-9: che ge mo la sogs pa'i 'gro ba rnams la yang dran par bya ba dang /
T02D3675:306a-12: mi brjed pa'i gzungs kyi mthu thob pa'i phrin las
T02D3675:306a-13: grub par mdzod cig / deng rgyal ba sras dang
T02D3675:306a-14: bcas pa de bzhin nyid gang dang mnyam pa nyid
T02D3675:306a-15: dang / ting 'dzin la zhugs pas mtha' dang dbus
T02D3675:306a-16: mi dmigs pa ltar sems can thams cad kyang de
T02D3675:306a-17: lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin rnyed par mkhyen pas gzigs
T02D3675:306a-18: shig / gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang /
T02D3675:306a-20: gang zag gzhan la chos go bar byed pa dang /
T02D3675:306a-21: so so yang dag par rig pa mi zad pa la mkhas pa dang /
T02D3675:306a-22: tshig thams cad rab tu dbye ba dang /
T02D3675:306a-23: tshig gcig la bskal pa brgya stong gi bar du ston shes pa dang /
T02D3675:306a-24: dri ba ji lta ba bzhin du the tshom gcod pa dang /
T02D3675:306a-25: thams cad du thogs pa med pa dang /
T02D3675:306a-26: sems can thams cad kyi khams dang spyod pa shes pa dang /
T02D3675:306a-27: chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong ci rigs
T02D3675:306a-28: pa la yang dag par ston par gyur cig /
T02D3675:306a-29: de bzhin gshegs pa sras dang bcas pa rnams kyi
T02D3675:306a-31: che ge mo la sogs pa'i 'gro ba ma lus pa rnams la chags pa dang /
T02D3675:306a-32: gnyis su 'dzin pa thams cad dang bral ba'i rnam
T02D3675:306a-33: par grol ba bla na med pa yang dag par
T02D3675:306a-34: rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par mdzod cig / gzhan
T02D3675:306a-35: yang bdag cag la sogs pa'i mnga' ris rnams kyang
T02D3675:306a-36: / ming dang gzugs dang longs spyod dang /
T02D3675:306a-37: spyod lam dang rigs la sogs pa gang gis sems
T02D3675:306a-38: can ma lus pa 'dul bar byed pa'i ye shes
T02D3675:306b-0: kyi rang bzhin du brtse bas yongs su khyab @306b
T02D3675:306b-1: bar mdzod cig / che ge mo la sogs pa'i
T02D3675:306b-2: 'gro ba ma lus pa rnams kyang shin tu nges
T02D3675:306b-4: 'bras bu rgya chen po ston pa'i chos 'chad pa
T02D3675:306b-5: dang ldan par gyur cig / ngag rnam par dag
T02D3675:306b-6: pas kun nas shes par byed pa /
T02D3675:306b-12: shin tu snyan pa'i dbyangs rab tu gsal ba /
T02D3675:306b-20: lus sems tshim par byed pa 'dod chags la sogs
T02D3675:306b-21: pa zhi bar byed pa'i rang bzhin du gyur cig
T02D3675:306b-22: / rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa'i byin gyi rlabs
T02D3675:306b-23: kyis che ge mo la sogs pa'i 'gro ba ma
T02D3675:306b-24: lus pa rnams kyi sems kyi rgyud yongs su dag
T02D3675:306b-25: pas dmigs pa las 'das pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs
T02D3675:306b-26: shing chos kyi dbyings dang dbyer med pa ste /
T02D3675:306b-27: ye shes kyi rang bzhin du gyur par mdzod cig
T02D3675:306b-28: / dbang po la sogs pa'i phyogs skyong ba rnams
T02D3675:306b-29: kyis che ge mo la sogs pa'i 'gro ba ma
T02D3675:306b-30: lus pa rnams kyi bar du gcod pa thams cad
T02D3675:306b-32: bsam pa thams cad yongs su grub pa dang /
T02D3675:306b-33: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa dar zhing rgyas par gyur
T02D3675:306b-34: cig / dam pa'i chos mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan
T02D3675:306b-35: phyogs bcur tshugs shig / dkyil 'khor chen po la
T02D3675:306b-36: 'jug pa rnams kyi phyi dang nang gi bar du
T02D3675:306b-37: gcod pa thams cad sol zhig / lam dang sgrub
T02D3675:306b-38: pa'i mi mthun pa'i rkyen thams cad phyir phyogs par
T02D3675:306b-39: mdzod cig /'jig rten pa la bde ba dang /
T02D3675:306b-43: bang mdzod 'phel bar mdzod cig / gnas dang bdag
T02D3675:306b-44: dang rnal 'byor bsrung ba la brtson par mdzod cig
T02D3675:306b-45: / sangs rgyas rnams kyi bka' drin dran pa dang
T02D3675:306b-46: / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gsung nyan pa dang /
T02D3675:306b-47: sgrub pa po'i dam la gnas par mdzod cig /
T02D3675:306b-48: dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis
T02D3675:306b-49: de bzhin du phrin las rgyas par mdzod cig /
T02D3675:306b-50: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /
T02D3675:306b-51: 'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa rnams la rdzas ma tshogs pa dang /
T02D3675:306b-52: cho ga lhag chad la sogs pa'i nyes pa thams cad bshags par bya'o //
T02D3675:307a-1: pa'i dngos grub zhus la 'khor lo'i dbang phyug la me tog gi phreng ba dbul lo //
T02D3675:307a-2: cho ga 'di ni rab gnas dang /
T02D3675:307a-4: dbang bskur ba la sogs pa'i bya ba la slob
T02D3675:307a-5: dpon dang slob mar bcas pa'i rgyud yongs su dag
T02D3675:307a-6: par byed pa'o // dgos pa'i dbang gis mchod pa dang /
T02D3675:307a-7: dkyil 'khor mngon par 'byung ba 'am bya ba la
T02D3675:307a-8: ni sngon du mtshan gyis bstod pa'i dngos gzhi stong
T02D3675:307a-10: cho ga dngos la zhugs pa na yan lag gi
T02D3675:307a-11: khyad par re re la yang ci nus pa'i phyag
T02D3675:307a-12: bya'o // shin tu rgyas pa bstan zin to //
T02D3675:307a-13: mdor bsdus pa la dga' ba rnams la phyag la sogs pa bya ba dang /
T02D3675:307a-14: sngon gyi tshig le'ur byas pa /
T02D3675:307a-15: phyogs rnams gtsang zhing mnyen pa dang //
T02D3675:307a-16: kun du dri dang ldan gyur pa //
T02D3675:307a-17: bde ba can gyi zhing khams ltar //
T02D3675:307a-18: sa gzhi byin gyis brlab par bgyi'o //
T02D3675:307a-19: phyi nang ma bsgribs gsal ba dang /
T02D3675:307a-20: rin chen rnams las grub pa yi //
T02D3675:307a-21: thub pa'i dbang po sras bcas kyi //
T02D3675:307a-22: gzhal yas khang du byin brlab bo //
T02D3675:307a-23: bla ma dkyil 'khor lha tshogs dang //
T02D3675:307a-24: phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas sras //
T02D3675:307a-25: bka' sdod phyogs skyong ma lus pa //
T02D3675:307a-26: de ring spyan 'dren gshegs su gsol /
T02D3675:307a-27: gtsang zhing dri zhim bsil ba yi //
T02D3675:307a-28: dri chang bdud rtsi'i rgyun lta bus //
T02D3675:307a-29: rgyal ba sras bcas ma lus pa //
T02D3675:307a-30: chu gsum gyis ni mnyes par bgyi'o //
T02D3675:307a-31: dus gsum bzhugs pa'i bla ma dang //
T02D3675:307a-32: rin chen gsum ni nam mkha' la //
T02D3675:307a-33: til gyi gong bu ltar dmigs nas //
T02D3675:307a-34: sgo gsum gus pas phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3675:307a-35: me tog la sogs nyer spyod dang //
T02D3675:307a-36: rgyal srid bdun dang grub pa'i rdzas //
T02D3675:307a-37: mchod sprin nam mkha' gang dmigs te //
T02D3675:307a-38: 'gro ba bsgral phyir dbul bar bgyi'o //
T02D3675:307a-39: bdag dang sems can mkha' mnyam gyis //
T02D3675:307a-40: thog med dus nas da lta'i bar //
T02D3675:307a-41: ma lus sdig pa ci bgyis pa //
T02D3675:307a-42: shin tu 'gyod pas bshags par bgyi'o //
T02D3675:307a-43: mngon mtho nges legs rgyur gyur pa'o //
T02D3675:307a-44: skye bos dge ba gang bgyis dang //
T02D3675:307a-45: 'phags pa'i tshogs kyis gang bgyis la //
T02D3675:307a-46: lhag par spro bas yi rang ngo //
T02D3675:307a-47: sgo gsum bsdams shing mi dge bcom //
T02D3675:307b-0: @307b ched du bya bas gzhan du brtson //
T02D3675:307b-1: lam bde tshogs chung 'jug pa zab //
T02D3675:307b-2: sdom pa gsum la gnas par bgyi //
T02D3675:307b-3: gtang bar dka' ba'i lus 'di ni //
T02D3675:307b-4: mgon dang bde gshegs sras bcas la //
T02D3675:307b-5: bran g-yog nyid du 'bul lags kyi //
T02D3675:307b-6: deng nas khyed kyi 'bangs su mchis //
T02D3675:307b-7: rgyal srid bu dang chung ma dang //
T02D3675:307b-8: 'bru dang rta glang bran du bcas //
T02D3675:307b-9: sa gzhi gser sogs rin po che //
T02D3675:307b-10: gus pas thub mchog rnams la mchod //
T02D3675:307b-11: sbyin dang tshul khrims sdom pa dang //
T02D3675:307b-12: thos bsam tshogs gnyis ci bsags pa //
T02D3675:307b-13: dus gsum bsdus pa'i dge ba gang //
T02D3675:307b-14: thub pa chos kyi spyan la dbul //
T02D3675:307b-15: sgeg 'dzum ldem zhing brjid pa dang //
T02D3675:307b-16: rngam zhing khros pa khro bo'i gzugs //
T02D3675:307b-17: sras bcas sku yi dkyil 'khor la //
T02D3675:307b-18: dad bas mig mi 'dzums par blta'o //
T02D3675:307b-19: sangs rgyas byang chub ma lus pa'i //
T02D3675:307b-20: tshe dang yon tan mthu stobs dang //
T02D3675:307b-21: sku gsum mdzad pa ma lus la //
T02D3675:307b-22: dbyangs snyan ngag gis bstod par bgyi'o //
T02D3675:307b-23: bla ma rdo rje slob dpon dang //
T02D3675:307b-24: yi dam dkyil 'khor lha tshogs te //
T02D3675:307b-25: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la //
T02D3675:307b-26: rtag tu gus pas skyabs su mchi //
T02D3675:307b-27: rgyal ba byang chub mchog brnyes nas //
T02D3675:307b-28: cung zad snyoms par bzhugs pa la //
T02D3675:307b-29: tshangs pa lta bus gus pa yis //
T02D3675:307b-30: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul //
T02D3675:307b-31: byang chub mdzad pa mthar phyin nas //
T02D3675:307b-32: bde gshegs mya ngan 'da' bzhed pa //
T02D3675:307b-33: ji srid 'khor ba mtha' yod pa //
T02D3675:307b-34: sems can don du bzhugs par gsol //
T02D3675:307b-35: ji ltar sngon gyi skyob pa yis //
T02D3675:307b-36: byang chub sems ni bskyed pa ltar //
T02D3675:307b-37: de bzhin bdag kyang sems can phyir //
T02D3675:307b-38: byang chub chen por sems bskyed do //
T02D3675:307b-39: rgyal sras 'jig rten skyong rnams la //
T02D3675:307b-40: sku gsum grub dang rig pa 'dzin //
T02D3675:307b-41: las tshegs phrin las rnam dbye sogs //
T02D3675:307b-42: las bcol de ni grub par mdzod //
T02D3675:307b-43: 'dir ni nyes pa gang byas pa //
T02D3675:307b-44: gang yang lus can skyabs gyur pa //
T02D3675:307b-45: ma 'tshal ba rnams bshags par bgyi //
T02D3675:307b-46: gtso bos ci nas bka' gnang 'tshal //
T02D3675:307b-47: 'bras bu mchog dang thun mong ste //
T02D3675:307b-48: ma nor tshig don shes rab dang //
T02D3675:307b-49: spobs pa mthu rtsal phun tshogs pa'i //
T02D3675:307b-50: dngos grub de dag gnang bar rigs //
T02D3675:308a-1: gsum bsags pa'i dge ba ni //
T02D3675:308a-2: tshogs gnyis bdud rtsi lta bu 'dis //
T02D3675:308a-3: sku gsum 'bras bu grub gyur nas //
T02D3675:308a-4: gzhan don 'bad med 'byung bar shog / de ltar
T02D3675:308a-5: bya ba ma lus mthar phyin nas dkyil 'khor la
T02D3675:308a-6: 'jug pa 'am / dkyil 'khor gshegs su gsol bar bya'o ;
T02D3675:308a-7: / yi ge brgya pa ci nus pa bzlas par bya'o //
T02D3675:308a-8: phongs pa rnams mgu ba dang /
T02D3675:308a-9: gzhi bdag la gtor ma sbyin par bya'o //
T02D3675:308a-10: lha thams cad la mchod pa lha grangs dang mnyam par byas pas mchod pa'o //
T02D3675:308a-11: dkyil 'khor la 'jug dri med cho ga 'dis //
T02D3675:308a-12: 'gro rnams mun pa bsal nas dkyil 'khor du //
T02D3675:308a-13: ma lus zhugs nas bde chen don rtogs te //
T02D3675:308a-14: bde ba can gyi zhing du myur bgrod shog //
T02D3675:308a-15: rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba /
T02D3675:308a-16: dngos grub brnyes pa'i slob dpon chen po bha ba bha tas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D3675:308a-19: // / ma h'a pandi ta shr'i bi ma la k'irti'i zhal snga nas dang /
T02D3675:308a-20: lo ts'a ba sh'akya'i dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pa
T02D3675:308a-21: zhang grub pa dpal bzang pos bal po'i grong khyar
T02D3675:308a-22: yam bu'i nub phyogs nyi ma'i gtsug lag khang du
